pkgmetadata.longdescription: odc.cloud=========Various cloud access helper methods.This package ships several namespaces:- `odc.aws.` S3 and other AWS resources- `odc.aio.` S3 but async, depends (needs `[ASYNC]` feature flag, pulls in `aiobotocore`)- `odc.azure.` Azure blob storage traversal helpers (needs `[AZURE]` feature flag)- `odc.thredds.` THREDDS traversal helper method (needs `[THREDDS]` feature flag)Installation------------```pip install odc-cloud```Usage-----TODO
